name: PINK!
description:
Albert Pinkerton, P. I.

PLEASE NOTE, THIS IS A FULL NOVEL WITH A LOT OF VOICE-OVERS. HOWEVER, IT SEEMS THE BROWSER VERSION IS NOT ABLE TO PLAY THEM. SO IF YOU WANT TO EXPERIENCE  THE FULL DIALOGUES, PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE SPINOFF APP AND PLAY IT FROM THERE.

Pinkerton is bored with the cases of finding missing cats! Then one dull morning, suddenly a beautiful lady comes to visit him unannounced. Her husband is missing, and she wants you to find him.

But is it really the truth? Why is her husband missing? As you investigate more, you find that everyone has their own version of what happened the night he went missing.

Use your power of deduction, sit back and enjoy this almost-movie-like visual novel!
